sentences.en: " And the best fisherman is you.
" Anyone can be a fisherman in May.
sentences.cn: “ 在五月里,人人都能当个好渔夫的. ”

sentences.en: But there was a price below which they dared not go, for it had happened that a fisherman in despair had given his pearls to the church.
sentences.cn: 但是有一个价格底线，他们不敢低于这个价格了，因为曾有渔夫因为价格太低而绝望得宁愿把珍珠募捐给教堂。

sentences.en: He tells of a Cuban fisherman who is a simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他讲的是个愚蠢的古巴渔民.

sentences.en: In scorn of that audience, he imagines another audience, another audience to write for and to emulate, an audience represented by the fisherman.
sentences.cn: 讽刺这个观众，他想象着另一个观众，可以为之写作，做榜样的观众，渔夫代表了这个观众。

sentences.en: In the opera he plays the part of an old fisherman.
sentences.cn: 他在戏里扮一位老渔翁.

sentences.en: Perhaps I should not have been a fisherman, he thought.
sentences.cn: 也许我不该当渔夫, 他想.

sentences.en: Peter became a judge but John remained a fisherman.
sentences.cn: 彼得当了法官,但约翰仍然是个渔民.

sentences.en: Peter has become a judge but John remains a fisherman.
sentences.cn: 彼得当了法官,但约翰仍是个渔民.

sentences.en: Some way from them, the fisherman cast his line.
sentences.cn: 在离他们稍远的地方，渔夫下了钩。

sentences.en: The Algarve is a paradise for fishermen whether river anglers or deep-sea fishermen.
sentences.cn: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

sentences.en: The fisherman cast off the rope and set the boat adrift.
sentences.cn: 渔夫解开缆绳,让船漂流而去.

sentences.en: The fisherman had a good haul.
The fisherman had caught a whopper.
sentences.cn: 那个打鱼的捕到一条特大的鱼.

sentences.en: The fisherman lost his balance and pitched into the sea.
sentences.cn: 渔夫失去了平衡,一头栽进海里.

sentences.en: The fisherman told him the name of the river.
sentences.cn: 渔夫向他讲了那条河流的名字.

sentences.en: The water came up to the fisherman's thighs.
With great difficulty, the fisherman manoeuvred his small craft close to the reef.
sentences.cn: 渔夫费了很大的劲才把他的小船划到暗礁旁。

trans.tran_en: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job
someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job
